com.mlt.db

Class Value

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.db.Value
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>

    public class Value
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>
    An immutable value of supported types.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
